alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Marlboro; Northern Horry; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 6:56PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bladen, Robeson, northwestern Columbus, Florence, central Georgetown, Dillon, east central Darlington, western Horry, Marion, southeastern Marlboro and Williamsburg Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 655 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a broken line of strong thunderstorms extending from 8 miles north of Tobermory to near Laurinburg to near Mechanicsville to near Kingstree and Saint Stephen. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Lumberton, Marion, Dillon, Lake City, Mullins, Elizabethtown, Red Springs, Kingstree, Horry, Pembroke, Andrews, Fairmont, Maxton, Mccoll, St. Pauls, Bladenboro, Johnsonville, Latta, and Pamplico. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 163 and 198. Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 1 and 37. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 1 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Marlboro; Northern Horry; Williamsburg
